thread.title: Galasys says CFO Hee Chee Keong to step down
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Galasys says CFO Hee Chee Keong to step down | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Galasys says CFO Hee Chee Keong to step down
text:
Oct 22 Galasys Plc :
* Announces that Hee Chee Keong, group's current chief financial officer (CFO), is stepping down from board
* Clarence Lo Siu Lun will replace Hee as interim CFO, a non-board position
* Chin Chee Siong, who has been a director since group's admission to AIM, has left board Source text for Eikon: (Bengaluru Newsroom +91 80 6749 1136)
